Package org.semanticweb.vlog4j.core.reasoner

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    KnowledgeBaseListener
    Listener to KnowledgeBase content change events.
    QueryResultIterator
    Iterator for QueryResults.
    Reasoner
    Interface that exposes the existential rule reasoning capabilities of VLog.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    KnowledgeBase
    A knowledge base with rules, facts, and declarations for loading data from further sources.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AcyclicityNotion  
    Algorithm  
    Correctness
    Enumeration of different correctness results (for example, the correctness of query answering for a reasoner).
    CyclicityResult
    Enumeration for the cyclicity property of a set of rules and predicates.
    LogLevel  
    ReasonerState
    Enum for the states a Reasoner can be in.
    RuleRewriteStrategy
